"One of everything on the menu," Marge demanded desperately as she practically shoved her money into the face of the young cashier. After several minutes, the overwhelmed staff finished the massive order and brought it to Marge's table. The blue haired housewife's stomach snarled angrily at the sight of the feast before her.

Her mouth inhaled the food quick as a flash, her teeth were barely used as she opted to swallow most of it whole. She licked her lips after each handful she shoveled into her gullet, her body demanding more with each swallow.
